DISHWASHER SAFE DURABILITY: Frying pan features durable aluminum construction that's dishwasher safe for quick and convenient cleanup

body.description: Radiant and solution-oriented, the Rachael Ray Create Delicious 12.5-Inch Aluminum Nonstick Deep Frying Pan brings high-performance and easy convenience to an essential pan made even more versatile with a deeper design. Featuring vibrant, shimmering color combined with value-driven functionality, this family-sized fry pan brings on Rachael's always-reliable performance with durable aluminum construction for ultra-even heating and browning. Made with higher sides for an enhanced cooking surface, this smart skillet features PlatinumShield(tm) Technology silver nonstick reinforced to be 9X harder than titanium for effortless food release of the stickiest recipes like Rach's Spinach-Artichoke Cheesy Tortellini or her Peppers 'n' Potatoes Beef Frying Pan Supper. Even better, the frying pan is dishwasher safe for quick and easy cleanup. A colorful, double-riveted stainless steel and silicone fry pan handle provides comfort and control that's oven safe to 400°F, flared rims make for easy pouring, and an induction-suitable stainless steel base provides strength, durability, and versatility to use the Frying Pan on any stovetop. From dishwasher-safe convenience to the enhanced durability of PlatinumShield(tm) nonstick, reach for the easy brilliance of the Rachael Ray Create Delicious 12.5-Inch Aluminum Nonstick Deep Frying Pan and get ready to get delish.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Cookware Sets Rachael's cookware sets include essential pots and pans, a baking pan and utensils for your kitchen. Deep Skillets With higher pan walls, Create Delicious deep skillets make it easier to stir and cook for a crowd. Saucepans Nonstick pots with rounded corners make it easier than ever to stir soups and sauces. Steamer Set A handy steamer set perfect for veggies and fish... or remove the steamer and just use the pot! Next page 1 Cookware Sets 2 Deep Skillets 3 Saucepans 4 Steamer Set

Quick Clean Up In The Dishwasher Rach's pots and pans are dishwasher safe, making it easier to clean up your kitchen. Helpful Lids & Handles With shatter-resistant glass lids and grippy pan and lid handles, monitor your food and cook with confidence.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My New Favorite Daily Use Pan
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this pan. Now, to be fair, I've only had it two weeks but I've used it nearly ever day, often multiple times a day, and don't exactly go easy on my pans. I was looking for a large, deep pan to make life easier when preparing stir fries and other single-pan meals without having to resort to a heavier pot or wok. I was specifically looking for something with tall, curved sides that enabled the tossing/flipping of food, yet had a nice, large cooking surface like a standard 12inch frying pan. I have a couple 'deep' pans with straight sides and they're okay but you can't toss/flip food with them.I tried a T-Fal pan first that was listed as 'deep' and the photos seemed to confirm that (and was $20 more than this pan), but what I got was no deeper than any of the other 'normal' pans I have. Very disappointing and I returned it right away.Next I tried this pan (Rachael Ray Create Delicious Deep Nonstick Frying Pan / Fry Pan / Skillet - 12.5 Inch, Blue, $29.11 at time of purchase) and was immediately thrilled right out of the box. The size and shape are exactly what I was looking for. It's not super heavy, making it easy to use and clean, and the curved sides makes tossing/flipping food easy peasy. While the pan didn't come with a lid, the glass lid from my 12inch Calphalon stainless steel pan fits perfectly (I think the lid fits this pan better than the Calphalon it came with), so I lucked out there.I've made all kinds of dishes so far, including stir fries, pasta dishes, salmon filets, pan fried chicken, burgers, fried eggs, scrambled eggs and hash, omelets, grilled cheese, breakfast burritos, etc., etc. Not a single "uh oh" moment along the way. The pan cooks evenly with no sticking or discernable hot spots.Physically the pan is doing great (again, only two weeks along). No dings or dents, no chipped or scratched paint, the bottom looks great and the cooking surface shows no signs of abnormal wear or warping. That said, because this pan has already become my daily driver I'll do an update down the road to see how it's holding up. I honestly don't have anything negative to say about this pan. If this pan holds up it'll be the best $30 I ever spent on cookware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I needed a larger pan size
reviews.reviewText: I perform a moderate level of cooking (I am no pro, but I can feed myself reasonably well!), and what I needed was a larger pan to cook bacon (no, I don't cook bacon in the oven, nor do I use a griddle--too hard to control grease splatters). It is indeed easy to clean, and after perhaps using it ten times in the last month, I see no scratches on the bottom. If I see them after further use, I will add an additional review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great pan. Sturdy. Easy to clean. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love it, but scratches easily.
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this pan! It’s a great size diameter and has a great depth to it. I use a large lid from one of my other old pans and it fits perfectly on top. Unfortunately, after just its first use, when I want to wash it, it had light scratches on it. Not through the coating but they were there and I used only silicone utensils on it. Since then, I have noticed two or three more scratches that have actually gone through the coating. The only metal utensil I ever used on this, and only ONE time was a whisk. I was very careful not to make contact with the pan itself. Even so, the rounded edges should not have scratched this the very few times I may have lightly brushed the whisk against it. For some reason when I left a similar view right after Buying this, Amazon flagged it and blocked it, saying it does not meet their standards. I don’t know what they meant by that because there was nothing offensive in the original review. We’ll see if they let us go through this time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We are really enjoying the pan a great size.
